goal.en: 1. Understand and familiarize with the operation and functional limitations of various instruments and equipment. 2. Master the measurement techniques of various physical quantities. 3. Learn various mathematical skills for organizing data and practice effective methods of presenting data graphically. 4. Repeatedly practice the analysis, deduction, induction, and critique of physical principles.
goal.ch: 1. 認識與瞭解各式儀器設備之操作方式及其功能限制 2. 熟悉各種物理量的量測技術 3. 學習各種整理數據的數學技巧、練習有效呈現數據的圖示方法 4. 反覆練習物理原理的分析、演繹、歸納與批判

content.en:
Week 1: Group Formation and Course Introduction
Week 2:
Groups 1-15: Oscilloscope
Groups 16-30: Multimeter
Week 3:
Groups 1-15: Multimeter
Groups 16-30: Oscilloscope
Week 4:
Groups 1-15: Atomic Spectroscopy
Groups 16-30: Laser Light
Week 5:
Quiz
Week 6:
Groups 1-15: RC Circuits
Groups 16-30: Electromagnetic Forces and Induction
Week 7:
Groups 1-15: Electromagnetic Forces and Induction
Groups 16-30: RC Circuits
Week 8:
Makeup Class
Week 9 (Midterm Exam Week):
No Class
Week 10:
Groups 1-15: Michelson Interferometer
Groups 16-30: Polarization of Light
Week 11:
Groups 1-15: Polarization of Light
Groups 16-30: Michelson Interferometer
Week 12:
Discussion Session
Week 13:
Groups 1-15: Atomic Spectroscopy
Groups 16-30: Laser Light
Week 14:
Groups 1-15: Laser Light
Groups 16-30: Atomic Spectroscopy
Week 15:
Discussion Session
Week 16:
Final Exam

textbook.ch: 普通物理實驗教學網頁 http://generalphysicslab.phy.ncu.edu.tw/phy_lab/exps.htm

grading.en: Attendance: 10％ Preliminary Report: 10％ Final Report: 30％ Oral Presentation: 30％ Practical Exam: 20％

flex_desc.en:
Two Weeks of Online Learning: Popular Science Lectures by the Taiwan Physical Society

1.	The History of Geomagnetic Research
https://youtu.be/s3af4VZGn-Y
2.	From Refraction to Invisibility - The Story of Metamaterials
https://youtu.be/GK-uiLo6XKY
3.	Three Centuries of Geomagnetism
https://youtu.be/OtFvSWNBvvU
4.	The Mini Universe in the Laboratory
https://youtu.be/2aujunstI1M
flex_desc.ch:
兩周線上學習台灣物理學會科普演講
1. 地磁研究的歷史
https://youtu.be/s3af4VZGn-Y
2. 從折射到隱形-超穎材料的故事
https://youtu.be/GK-uiLo6XKY
3. 地磁三百年
https://youtu.be/OtFvSWNBvvU
4. 實驗室裡的小宇宙
https://youtu.be/2aujunstI1M
